SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, Z.* FROM (SELECT TC_NUM, TO_CHAR(TCWORK_START,'YY.MM.DD') as DAY, TO_CHAR(TCWORK_START,'HH24:MI:SS') as TCWORK_START, TO_CHAR(TCWORK_END,'HH24:MI:SS') as TCWORK_END, TO_CHAR(TCGOOUT_START,'HH24:MI:SS') as TCGOOUT_START, TO_CHAR(TCGOOUT_END,'HH24:MI:SS') as TCGOOUT_END, TC_STATE,TCETC,MEM_CODE FROM TIMECARD WHERE MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} ORDER BY DAY DESC ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #{record_end_no}) WHERE RNUM >= #{record_Start_no}
SELECT TCETC FROM TIMECARD WHERE MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} AND TO_CHAR(TCWORK_START,'YY.MM.DD') = #{day}

SELECT ROWNUM,TC_NUM, TO_CHAR(TCWORK_START,'YY.MM.DD') as DAY, TO_CHAR(TCWORK_START,'HH24:MI:SS') as TCWORK_START, TO_CHAR(TCWORK_END,'HH24:MI:SS') as TCWORK_END, TO_CHAR(TCGOOUT_START,'HH24:MI:SS') as TCGOOUT_START, TO_CHAR(TCGOOUT_END,'HH24:MI:SS') as TCGOOUT_END, TC_STATE,TCETC,MEM_CODE FROM TIMECARD WHERE TO_CHAR(TCWORK_START,'YYMM') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYMM') AND MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} AND ROWNUM <=3 ORDER BY DAY DESC
